author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
>His content is also of enough interest to 84 people who found it compelling enough to subscribe to have it added to their homepage

As far as I know, subscribing doesn't add anything to your homepage.

I tried this: 1. Subscribe to a small guild with few posts and unsub from every other guild, 2. Subscribe to some users with public profiles, 3. Visit home page

What I see: Posts from the guild I'm subscribed to along with my own posts

What I don't see: Posts from the users I've subscribed to

I don't even know why diogenesjunior has that many subscribers. I think it was because his bio once said "pls don't sub to me pls".

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
His content is also of enough interest to 84 people who found it compelling enough to subscribe to have it added to their homepage

As far as I know, subscribing doesn't add anything to your homepage.

I tried this: 1. Subscribe to a small guild with few posts and unsub from every other guild, 2. Subscribe to some users with public profiles, 3. Visit home page

What I see: Posts from the guild I'm subscribed to along with my own posts

What I don't see: Posts from the users I've subscribed to

I don't even know why diogenesjunior has that many subscribers. I think it was because his bio once said "pls don't sub to me pls".

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
>But since you’re subscribed to this user who posted there, that specific thread will appear as it would if you were a member of that guild.

Hm, in my example, the guild I was subscribed to (+Private to be specific) was so small that the home page ended up being less than a page long. The users I was subscribed to (CrystalVulpine and captainmeta4 to be specific) have hundreds of posts. Not a single one of them appeared on my home page.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
But since you’re subscribed to this user who posted there, that specific thread will appear as it would if you were a member of that guild.

Hm, in my example, the guild I was subscribed to (+Private to be specific) was so small that the home page ended up being less than a page long. The users I was subscribed to (CrystalVulpine and captainmeta4 to be specific) have hundreds of posts. Not a single one of them appeared on my home page.

author.bio_html: amogus.

body:
Probably not related but I'm sick of seeing slurs in Ruqqus. Like okay bro we get it you don't like jews transgender etc but you don't need to say "it's the joooos" "haha tranny go commit die"
Can't you just be nice and keep your hate to yourself?
Freedom of speech doesn't mean you  can insult people for absolutely no reason and people will be cool with it.
